website_summaries.verdict: A very good fly rod, particularly for beginners, this is good for both fishing and practice casting.
pros: Smooth casting action and good balance
cons: Reel seems flimsy and can fall off rod under load
Rod tip can shatter under load

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This fly rod is beautiful. It has a good looking finish and is built very well. This rod even comes with an extra tip making it a total of 5 pieces. The length is 8'1" so a little shorter than what I'm used to. I will be using this to toss streamers in the local river.
customer_reviews.author: LovingMontana

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend and for the price it can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: As described! Would recommend and for the price it can't be beat!. First cast and boom! Fish! Fun times were had!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn n Iezzi

customer_reviews.title: The rod itself is quality.
customer_reviews.text: The rod arrived well packaged. The sleeve bag was somewhat flimsy. The rod itself is great quality it comes with two top secrions. I had read a few reviews that said the top eyelet had broken off. I took the rod out with me to test it out. Its not really a great time in my area for trout so I tested it at a local lake and was suprised how the rod reacts and its weight. Of course I did not catch anything but tested the strenght with a 5 lb weight and it held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Rod is lite weight and cast well, flies are cheaply made but I order a rod not flies. Those I make myself, but for the most part this product gets five stars from me 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a beginner rod
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times, caught some fresh water salmon just fine. Obviously this pole is more suited for someone learning how to fly fish (which is why I purchased it) eventually I’ll upgrade, but I have a blast with this one until then
customer_reviews.author: Aaron V

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Put it together and went fishing the day I got it. I haven't fly fished for years, and the combo made it easy to get back into it. Beware of the trees behind you when you cast! I forgot you have to look both ways when getting back into it! No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Koishal

customer_reviews.title: Great set up for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this set up. I've never fly fished before but have always wanted to try it. I was impressed by the quality of the pole and reel. Seems well built and balanced. I took this down my local sportsmens club to test it out and with only about 15 minutes of me practicing how to cast I caught 2 pan fish. I had to go to work soon after or I would of stayed longer but 2 fish in 15min for my first ever time out is good with me. I'll definitely be using this a lot this summer. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Elocity

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Brand new to fly fishing. Have watched lots of instructional videos on YouTube about fly fishing. The item arrived as advertised. Quick and easy setup. Now the rest is on me to learn how to use it properly. Caught 3 small bluegills the first trip out with it. Now I'm "hooked" on fly fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hitts

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was rather surprised by this combo; it casts beautifully and it well made. I am not too sure about the gold finish on the reel seat or how well that will hold up but overall, it is worth the money in my opinion. The flies are terrible but the fly box is fine; I just tossed the flies out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fly fishing set!
customer_reviews.text: Great basic fly fishing kit. I wanted to try out fly fishing so before committing to a bunch of expensive gear, I decided to buy a starter kit and give it a go. This set is really well made, the reel turns well and have a great tensioner, looks good, and works perfectly. Don’t hesitate with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Noe

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well-made. And the customer service is outstanding! I broke my Plusinno fly rod and received a refund to purchase a new one. What company does that today? I was willing to just buy a new part, but Plusinno insisted they refund my purchase price so I could receive a brand new rod! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Decker

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid NC fly fisherman, I bought this combo for people who go with me. I personally use Orvis rods and reels but this combo comes very close at 1/16 of the price. Great action and very easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Patrick111

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Took out five times flies fishing. The last time I used it the thing broke right in the middle of the second section. Only thing a was doing was casting it out. Not happy at all with the quality of this product. Don't buy this or any of their rods.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS FLY FISHING ROD COMBO FOR MY 10 YEAR OLD GRANDSON. HE AND I FISH AS OFTEN AS THE WEATHER PERMITS. THIS YEAR WE ARE VENTURING INTO THE WORLD OF FLY FISHING. I CAN'T RAVE ENOUGH ABOUT THE QUALITY OF EVERYTHING IN THE SET. THE REEL FEELS VERY STURDY AND HAS A SMOOTH MOVEMENT. THE CASE IS VERY WELL MADE AND HAS A CONVENIENT ZIPPER POCKET FOR STORAGE. MY GRANDSON WAS ELATED WITH IT AS THIS MEANS MORE OUTDOOR ADVENTURES WITH GRANDMA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo for an avid never tried this before
customer_reviews.text: Want to get into the hobby. Love this combo. Only thing i would change is maybe buying my own flies. I bet these are not that great.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Dude, get this. As a first time flyfisherman ...
customer_reviews.text: Dude, get this. As a first time flyfisherman this does everything i would think a $1000 pole could do. Only thing i would say is the flies are cheap either splurge for another set or go to the local shop and ask the pros what to use this season and how to fish with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not able to get in touch with customer service  to report a snapped tip.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for Father's Day . It seemed like a great deal . However first time out the tip snapped when trying to reel in a fish. We have tried to contact customer service several times about getting a replacement but have had difficulty doing so as the contact information is not correct. Too bad because when we recieved it we were very excited . It "seemed " like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: A perfect beginners rod that has a good feel to it
customer_reviews.text: A perfect beginners rod that has a good feel to it. it has a good backbone, casts pretty smoothly, and comes with everything you need to get to the river, out of the box. Though the fly box it came with, in my opinion, is pretty much garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Hayato K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Looks great but ferrules will destroy your lines.  Buy from a reputable
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The ferrules are so sharp they will destroy your fly lines. For pennies this’s could have been a good pole. What a waste. Requested refund. No response
customer_reviews.author: Robert G McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: so that part was good.
customer_reviews.text: the reel did not fit on the rod. I could not unscrew the nut enough to make the foot of the reel fit in the slots. had to return. seller promptly credited my account, so that part was good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: It is affordable. Awesome starting kit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! There is nothing I doont like about it! Yes I am a beginner fly angler so I wanted to get something that is good to begin with. This product is I would say one of the better beginner fly poles out there for a very affordable price!! I got it today and took it right out fishing! I caught fish with it and I wanted to upload pics, but it is not letting me upload them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I just took a trip to New Zealand and bought this rod because of its weight and size when broken down. I landed a nice size rainbow the third cast!
customer_reviews.author: David Neil

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little combo kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first fly rod and reel so nothing to compare it to,but it's a really nice set that seems like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fly pole quality is fenomenal for the price I would of paid nearly 200 for this quality, the flys it comes with are nothing special but they did catch some rainbows and cutthroat. Zipper on the case snapped but still works just put a paper clip on to use as a handle to open and close it. Only thing I would ask for is a hook loop at the base to hold a strung rod in place while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor melman

customer_reviews.title: ... fly rod opening day of trout season and really like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I used the fly rod opening day of trout season and really like it a lot. Great product can’t believe you can get this quality for little money. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is a great package.....items are all high quality, sturdy travel case..highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: FunInTheSun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. well made, well balanced. Best of all, It makes "Fly fishing" a very approachable experience for anyone with a small budget. All one needs to add is a few more variety of different flies, and that is about it. Go fly fishing!
customer_reviews.author: Leebone

customer_reviews.title: Made me a better caster
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rod. It casts effortlessly, handles fish very well and looks like a really nice, quality rod. Enjoyed fishing with this Rod very much.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: Rod is OK, Reel is a piece of junk and trow the fly box in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Small fish only
customer_reviews.text: Came fast worked grate till I had a good sized bass on then the rod snapped in tow places small fish works grate 8 plues pounds my rod did not stand up
customer_reviews.author: Jessie derose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beginner pole
customer_reviews.text: Pole is good. Flys are kinda useless. Comes with everything and reel already has the backing and line and leader tied.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Timmons

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased with the gift
customer_reviews.text: The Plusinno Lightweight Ultra Portable Fly Rod package was purchased as a gift for my husband. It was delivered on time, as promised, even though it was a last minute purchase. He was very pleased with the gift, and has enjoyed playing with it in the yard, in preparation for an upcoming trip later this month. Yes, it does include lots of fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Springs, MO

customer_reviews.title: Snapped! first fish on
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes due to the positive reviews. Looked to be of great quality. Got about 5 cats out of it! A 12inch trout shouldn't have been able to snap this rod in half the first time I had it on the water. Hope to send it back in time for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: sr1911

customer_reviews.title: Great first fly rod.
customer_reviews.text: Great first fly rod. Took it backpacking in the smokies and caught over half a dozen trout. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't seem like a sturdy fishing pole but it it very durable! I love this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like a child's did and reel. Should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet, but looks great! Got this for my grandson,now PawPaw is jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Sally, St.Peters, Mo

customer_reviews.title: There are no instructions for the reel. I emailed ...
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions for the reel. I emailed for customer support to reverse the direction of the drag and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: albert c. rhea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very true action. Reel exceeded my expectation. Carry case could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: dave oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginners kit !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality kit for the price, I would expect to pay much more for a complete kit like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and looked fine but I didn't open and assemble because it's for my husband's birthday. He just opened it and it's missing the 3rd piece in the rod so it cannot be assembled. I will update this review if I get a fully functional product. UPDATE: After submitting my original review, I was contacted by the seller the next day. They were very nice and they sent a replacement rod which arrived about 10 days later. My husband is very happy with this rod, and is great for beginners to fly fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Threads on the reel adjustment bolt damaged could not secure reel to pole.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good quality. I would like to have seen a better quality backing and the supplied fly box was falling apart when i opened it for the first time. The rod its self feels nice in the hands and the reel is nice and smooth. the drag even works pretty well. Mine even came with a second tip section, i am guessing that they had complaints about them arriving broken or something.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Rod issues
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt a huge fan of this rod. The reel is pretty nice but the rod itself wasnt as good as i expected. It liked to slide apart at two of the joints after about 4 casts. Drove me up the wall. My 30 dollar rod doesnt even do that. So meh i will pass.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Diederichs

customer_reviews.title: coming from a long line of fly fishers this product ...
customer_reviews.text: coming from a long line of fly fishers this product blew my mind. Very well made and very compact. i would give this product 5 stars if the extra tip it came with was a little stronger. i broke my first one on a 15 inch fish. other than that this product is very good
customer_reviews.author: Eli Pittz

customer_reviews.title: Weak tip
customer_reviews.text: Tip was broke when I received it. I ended up buying another brand same weight and the tip was considerably stronger just appon inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell C.

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought for a bday present for grandson. it was perfect and he loves it.everything you need is included to go fishing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Received it in good condition, was surprised to see an extra tip in the case. Rod is very light and the reel matches perfectly, this rod looks like it should cost much more. The case is very well made and protects the rod perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Miles

customer_reviews.title: Good pole!
customer_reviews.text: Great intro pole! We bought this for hikes up into the mountains in Colorado- ultralight!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Kara Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a couple of weeks ago. Haven't used it yet but looking forward to spring. So far everything looks great. Everything included to start fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Rod and reel was well made. Perfect for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Will J

customer_reviews.title: This rod is exactly what I was expecting for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This rod is exactly what I was expecting for the price I paid. I'm excited to get out and use it. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crafton

customer_reviews.title: Amazon help
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year old used it 5 times granite broke will Amazon take care of me
customer_reviews.author: Terence Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first fish
customer_reviews.text: I got this pole and brought it to a pond today and I caught a small bluegill and the rod snapped on the top piece I want to contact the company so I can be sent a new pole and return the other one but I am triggered.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Seems cheap
customer_reviews.text: I received a broken rod. I could not unscrew the part to put the reel on rendering it useless. Instead I went a different direction and got a Wetfly tenkara pole.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: For the most part - I liked the rig - accept for the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the most part - I liked the rig - accept for the fact that the reel did not work the way it was suppose to - but rest assure I will be picking a different type when I go beck on to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Zworkman

customer_reviews.title: Would like to get two new rod ends
customer_reviews.text: Both of the top pieces of rod broken, managed to repair with kit but reduced length by five inches on one the other could not repair. Would like to get two new rod ends, please tell me how to do this. Other than that overall pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice case, rod and flies
customer_reviews.text: purchased the rod/reel combo. nice case, rod and flies, however the reel was junk. the spool was real wobbly on the frame and could not reel it in, it kept hanging up. I don't know if it was a defective reel or not, just sent it back and got a full refund. great customer service. disappointed it didn't work out but would be willing to try it again if it was just a defective reel.
customer_reviews.author: robb perry

customer_reviews.title: I don't have other prior experience but I an not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I cracked it in the first use. Flexible but no so much. I don't have other prior experience but I an not happy.
customer_reviews.author: milton

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories but the rod broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rod taking a chance on a budget rod and was sorely disappointed. It broke after just three casts with the reel portion falling completely off the rod. I will be returning for a refund. The reel seems nice and the flybox is great but the rod just isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pope

customer_reviews.title: Poles look really nice but 2/3 reels were garbage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a family fly fishing trip to Montana this week. Poles look really nice but 2/3 reels were garbage. Didn't spin one was bent. Buyer beware. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: M8KTRAX

product_meta.title: PLUSINNO Fly Fishing Rod and Reel Combo, 4 Piece Lightweight Ultra-Portable Graphite Fly Rod 5/6 9’ Complete Starter Package with Carrier Bag
feature_bullets: 🎣 Complete 5/6 weight Fly Fishing Rods Reel Combo Kit - 4 piece fly rod contains a free rod tip, a large arbor reel, preinstalled line, a fly box, flies, and a lightweight rod case with a zippered storage pouch.

🎣 Premium Performance Fly Rod - The mid flex IM8 graphite fly rod comes with stainless steel stripper guide which reduces friction and heat, and won't harm the fish line. It’s also made up of superior single foot snake guides and metal adjustable CNC aluminum reel seat which effectively avoids loose swing phenomenon on fishing. The western-style grip made with high quality cork and compressed cork trim rings helps casting accuracy and avoids fatigue.

🎣 Diecast Aluminum Fly Fishing Reel - Durable aluminum construction and spool, Gear ratio is 1:1. One-way only roller bearing system, Ball Bearings: 2+1BB. Superior Teflon disk drag design, Line Weight: 5/6 External Dia: 2-9/10", Net Weight: 5.2 oz. Pre-loaded 20lb 98ft backing, weight forward 6-weight floating 100ft fly line, and 9ft 3X leader.

🎣 Floating Fly Flies Kit and Excellent Rod Case - The Beginner Fly Fishing Kit is composed of a 4.5" x 3.2" x 1.2" waterproof fly box and 16 flies. It's the best fishing kit suited for trout, pan fish, small streams, ponds, and backpacking. The study rod case with a zippered storage pouch holds everything you need for fly fishing. It suits a wide range of abilities and techniques, especially for starters and experienced anglers.

🎣 Perfect Service - For assuring our customer enjoy a superior shopping experience, we offer 12 month warranties on all of our products. Warm Prompt: as you encounter any quality problem, please contact us directly and our friendly customer service professionals will address your needs as soon as possible. It's the best gift to send father, son, husband, fiancé, boyfriend.
